prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon with sleek white fur and blue accents, featuring long wings.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a wolf, with striking blue highlights and a mysterious demeanor.
Make an elegant creature with a majestic appearance, predominantly white with blue details.
Generate a fierce-looking Pokemon with sharp claws and an agile body, perfect for stealthy attacks.
Design a fantasy Pokemon that embodies the essence of shadows, with a sleek silhouette and unique features.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in forests, with a color scheme that emphasizes its connection to the night.
Give me a Pokemon with an aura of mystery, combining elements of elegance and darkness in its design.
